name: Posmetrics
overview:
Posmetrics provides a turnkey service for collecting customer surveys.

Collect Surveys on an iPad in your Business or Event Posmetrics allows you to collect feedback from over 15% of your customers, a fraction not even remotely achievable with paper or email-based feedback methods.

Customers have fun giving feedback on an iPad With Posmetrics, surveys are a positive experience for the customer. Rather than wading through page after page of an online survey, customers can give feedback in just 5 touches, and while the experience is still fresh in their minds.

Instant follow-up Posmetrics lets you instantly send follow up emails to your most and least satisfied customers, allowing you to increase reviews on Yelp or TripAdvisor, collect more “likes” on Facebook, or simply reach out to more of your customers.
